info.description: API to fetch Youtube video captions
info.title: Video Captions API

get.description: This endpoint retrieves captions and start and end time for a corresponding section of given video according to index of this section. The video ID must be provided in the path. Index values start from 0. The response also contains total quantity of video sections in video and video name.

400.description: Bad Request (e.g., invalid input, not translatable, invalid video ID)

404.description: Not Found (e.g., no captions found, video unavailable)

416.description: Requested Range Not Satisfiable (e.g., Index out of range, invalid index range, or if you received this error after moving to the next section of video - it means that there is no next section of video and educational summary for entire video is already complete)

422.description: Unprocessable Entity (e.g., unsupported data type, excessively long video_id)

500.description: Internal Server Error (e.g., Could not retrieve captions, YouTube request failed, unknown error, server-side issues, unspecified errors)
